summary:
Title:
IA Bandit Armory.

Description:
This mod will add a "new" whole light armor set (with shield and weapon) with bandit in mind, to the game.

Inspiration:
Inspired by such great mods like Immersive Armors by Hothtrooper44, Armor Immersive Mashups by Bryanwee20, and a few others.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][center][size=2][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75647-15-1463332511.jpg[/img]
Title:
[size=2]IA Bandit Armory.[/size]
[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]Description:
[/size][size=2]This mod will add a "new" whole light armor set (with shield and weapon) with bandit in mind, to the game.
[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]Inspiration:
[/size][size=2]Inspired by such great mods like Immersive Armors by Hothtrooper44, Armor Immersive Mashups by Bryanwee20, and a few others.
[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]How:
[/size][size=2]This Bandit Set could be crafted, upgraded and enchanted at the forge/anvil, workbench, grindstone and arcane enchanters.
[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]Stuff:
[/size][size=2]You may need some leather, leather strips, and some iron ingot or iron ore to could craft this set.
[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]Gender/race:
[/size][size=2]This set work for both genders and races, with weight slider support.
[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]Stats:
[/size][size=2]For the stats, please look at the pictures. (As good as the Light Stalhrim Armor Set from Dragonborn).
[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]Level:
[/size][size=2]Intended for Dragonborn/Follower with level 45/50 but could be done with a Dragonborn level 1 (A bit OP maybe?).
[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]Require:Â No DLC
[/size][size=2](Nothing): No DLC, no perk or anything required.
[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]Version:
[/size][size=2]English and French version available, sorry for my English.
[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]Thanks:
[/size][size=2]Thanks, Setvi.
[/size][size=2]
[/size][size=2]Credits:
[/size][size=2]A Steel Heater Shield by Abakus.
+ Bandit Set - Dark Souls II
& Bandit Set - Dark Souls.
+ CD Projekt - The Witcher.
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75647-1-1463347524.jpg[/img][/size][/center][/color][/font][/i][/b]
author: Setvi
